column2: "Just when you think you've become one badass Hunter, that's when you have to take a cold, hard look at yourself."
"Have you gotten soft? Have your actions been lacking in consideration toward others?"
"I'm not saying you're a failure or anything. It's just, you always need to leave room for teamwork and cooperation."
"Relax, pal, you can learn that through experience."
"Even I'm still learning, if you can believe that. So what do you say you join me in the Lost Sea to practice some teamwork?"
